analysis.Summary: Vue 3 functional component that displays a standardized 'empty state' UI block with a title, description, and optional action button.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable placeholder view when there is no data to show (e.g. empty list or search results).

Components.name: EmptyState
Components.responsibility: Render an empty state section with customizable title, description, and optional action button.

Functions.name: callback
Functions.description: Invoked when the optional action button is clicked.

analysis.Usage:
import EmptyState from 'components/EmptyState/EmptyState.vue'
// then use in template:
<EmptyState
  title="No results"
  description="Try adjusting your filters"
  action="Refresh"
  :callback="onRefresh"
/>
Notes: Uses <script setup> and defineProps API from Vue 3.
The action button only renders if the 'action' prop is provided.
Default props cover common empty-state messaging; override as needed.
No emitted events are declaredâ€”callback is passed in as a function prop.
